attributes.action: Bring back compolsary national service to whoever leaves school with no GCSE's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring back compolsary national service to whoever leaves school with no GCSE's.
This will make children pay more attention in school and create more of a goal for there GCSE'S.
Also it shall increase the man power of the armed forces.
And create many jobs in the nation in these bad times.
Also it will bring more respect for this nation for the next generation.
If the child wishes to join the armed forces after school anyway he can go to a army college from the the age of 14 full time instead of school.
With there parents permission.
